name: Sweet Resilience
text:
SWEET RESILIENCE
BAKERY & CAFE 516A Victoria Ave East Thunder Bay, ON P7C 1A7

807-623-8055 info.sweetresilience@gmail.com

Tiktok @sweet.resilience Instagram @sweet_resilience25 Facebook @sweet resilience

www.sweetresilience.com

Open seven days a week 7:00 am – 5:30 pm

We take pride in sourcing as many local ingredients as we can – bringing communities together through wholesome contemporary food.

LOCALLY SOURCED INGREDIENTS
Rose N Crantz Roasting Co. Hearthstone Breads Mahtaj Patisserie Dough Bagel Co. Bears Bees & Honey Thunder Oak Cheese Farm Tarrymore Farms International House of Tea

Buns
Bannock $2.50/$9.50 (Single/½ Dozen) Ciabatta Buns $3.25/$10.00 (Single/½ Dozen) Pretzel Buns COMING SOON Sticky Buns $6.00/$30.00 (Single/½ Dozen)

Loaves
Babka $4.00/$14.00 (Slice/Loaf) Loaves $3.75/$12.50 (Slice/Loaf)

Pastries (Single/½ Dozen)
Muffins $2.75/$9.50 Scones $3.25/$12.00 Croissants COMING SOON Danishes COMING SOON Donuts $4.50 each

Bars & Cookies (Single/½ Dozen)
Coffee ''Bean'' Cookie $2.25/$10.25 Cherry Chocolate Chunk $4.25/$18.50 Oatmeal Raisin $4.25/$18.50 Maple Mocha Nanaimo Bar $4.50/$18.50

Cakes (Slice/Cake)
New York Cheesecake $6.50/$35.00 Caramel Apple Cheesecake $7.25/$40.00 Mocha Cheesecake $7.25/$40.00 Strawberry Shortcake $8.25/$45.00 Earl Grey Cream $8.25/$50.00 Orange Creamsicle $8.25/$50.00 Salted Caramel $8.25/$50.00

Pies
Apple Pie COMING SOON Blueberry Crumble COMING SOON Cheese Potato Pie COMING SOON

Bagels
Candied Bacon BLT $10.75 Smoked bacon jam, sliced bacon, tomatoes, arugula, roasted garlic mayo

Cured Salmon Cream Cheese $11.75 Cured salmon, lemon dill cream cheese, pickled red onion, capers, fresh dill

Chicken Caesar $11.25 Seasoned chicken, sliced bacon, romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, parmesan cheese

Bannock
Egg & Bacon (or Sausage) $4.25 Tarrymore Farm fried egg, smoked bacon (or sausage), roasted garlic mayo

Chicken Caesar $11.25 Seasoned chicken, sliced bacon, romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, parmesan cheese

Extra ham or bacon $2.00 Add cheese $0.50 Strawberries & Cream Cheese $4.50 Strawberries and honey whipped cream cheese

Flatbread
Everything Breakfast $16.75 Everything spiced cream cheese, bacon, cheddar cheese, scrambled eggs, tomatoes, arugula

Caprese $15.75 Fresh local tomatoes, basil, olive oil, balsamic glaze, salt & pepper

Cured Salmon & Dill $17.25 Lemon dill whipped cream cheese, cured salmon, pickled red onion, capers, arugula

Chicken Caesar $17.25 Seasoned chicken, sliced bacon, romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, parmesan cheese

Panini of the Day
See our board for more info on our daily panini

Soup of the day
Standard (12 oz) $7.25 Side (8 oz) $5.25 See our board for more info on our daily soup

Salad
As a side to any Sandwich (12 oz) $6.75 House garden and Caesar options

Hot Beverages
Coffee (8 oz) $2.50 Coffee (12 oz) $3.50 We proudly serve Rose N Crantz Roasting Co. coffee

Tea (8 oz) $2.75 Tea (12 oz) $3.75 Various International House of Tea blends – see in bakery for more details

Espresso $3.25 Latte (16 oz) $4.75 Mocha (16 oz) $5.25 Chai Tea Latte (16 oz) $4.75 Hot Chocolate (12 oz) $4.50 London Fog (16 oz) $4.75 Flavour Shots $0.50

Cold Beverages
Iced Coffee (12 oz) $4.75 Blended Coffee (16 oz) $6.25 Bananas Foster Strawberries & Cream Mint Chocolate Chip

Put it on Ice! Have any of our hot beverages cold for an additional $1.25
